data.title: Rail
data.meta_description: With light and commuter rail lines to more than 50 stations throughout the metro area, where do you want to go today?
data.text:
Stations

Quickly get to major hot spots like Denver International Airport, the Theatre District, Convention Center, Empower Field at Mile High, Pepsi Center, the 16th Street Mall, and Anschutz Medical Center.

Get information about individual train stations

Service Disruptions

Your schedule is important so we work hard to stay on ours. When special events, construction or maintenance interfere with our schedule, we want you to know about it. Here you will find information on detours, delays, stop closures, elevator outages and other issues that may affect your route or station.

Learn about planned disruptions

How to Ride: Rail

New to RTD? Once you've tried it, you'll find that our trains are the fast, comfortable, and convenient way to get around. Read our How to Ride guide to start riding like a regular.

Learn how to ride the train

Discount Fares

Discount fares are available for those who qualify. Purchasing passes and ticket books will save you time and money. Explore your options and choose the one thatâ€™s right for you.

Learn about our discount fare program
